inventory.name: Sword
inventory.description: A sharp blade, made of steel, used to vanquish foes.

inventory.name: Health Potion
inventory.description: A bottle with liquid that restores health

inventory.name: Leather Armor
inventory.description: A armor made of leather that provides basic protection.

inventory.name: Glimmering Starlight Dust
inventory.description: Tiny fragments of starlight distilled into a sparkling dust. This precious substance is rumored to hold within it the essence of creation's earliest moments and could grant immense insight to those who possess it.
